definitions.definition: to respect; to honour; to hold in high esteem

parsedExamples.example: 互相尊敬  ―  hùxiāng zūnjìng  ―  to respect one another; mutual respect

parsedExamples.translation: Jìrán nǐmen dōu yǐjīng xiǎng qīngchu le, nà wǒ zūnjìng nǐmen de yìyuàn. [Pinyin]

examples: 互相尊敬  ―  hùxiāng zūnjìng  ―  to respect one another; mutual respect
